    @pytest.fixture(scope="session")
    def auth_client(raw_client):
        """
        全局认证客户端
        - 登录成功：写入 token + USER_ID
        - 失败：skip 所有依赖它的用例
        """
    
        login_cases = load_yaml("data/register.yaml")
        login_case = login_cases[0]
        login_req = login_case["request"]
    
        resp = raw_client.request(
            method="POST",
            url="/auth/register",
            params={"force_no_encrypt": "567f9c9a-28cf-4096-b540-e428f40a1e74-jh82"},
            json_body=login_req,
        )
    
        if not resp.response or resp.response.status_code != 200:
            logging.warning("❌ 登录接口 HTTP 失败，跳过所有依赖登录的用例")
    
        biz = resp.biz_json or {}
        token = biz.get("token")
    
        if not token:
            logging.warning("❌ 登录失败（未返回 token），跳过所有依赖登录的用例")
    
        raw_client.set_token(token)
        logging.info("✅ 登录成功，token 已写入")
    
        # ===== 获取用户信息 =====
        profile = raw_client.request(
            method="POST",
            url="/api/users/i/info",
            params={"force_no_encrypt": "567f9c9a-28cf-4096-b540-e428f40a1e74-jh82"},
            json_body={}
        )
    
        if not profile.biz_json:
            pytest.skip("❌ 获取用户信息失败，跳过后续用例")
